welcome:
🐾 *Welcome!* This bot will allow you to see the exchange rates to tenge (⚠️ ratio to other currencies DOES NOT WORK!) 
Select currencies below:

lang-settings.msg: Выберите язык / Тілді таңдаңыз / Choose language

help:
Available teams: 

/start - (Re)Starting bot 
/settings - Settings bot 
/help - help 

Calculator: 

/rub <число> - rub * tenge 
/eur <число> - euro * tenge 
/usd <число> - dollar * tenge
